articles.title: Why snow and blackouts in Texas are a preview for all of us
articles.description: Texans are suffering after a rare snowstorm knocked out power for more than 4 million homes. But climate change means extreme weather -- and blackouts -- could become the new normal nationwide.

articles.title: Professor explains why Texas power system is struggling
articles.description: CNN's Brianna Keilar speaks with Daniel Cohan, a professor at Rice University, about the power outages in Texas due to the severe winter weather.

articles.author: Analysis by Nic Robertson, International Diplomatic Editor
articles.title: What's behind Biden's snub of the Saudi Crown Prince
articles.description: In a region where respect, or the lack of it, is as powerful as a physical punch, President Joe Biden's press secretary just landed a sharp jab on the jaw of Saudi Arabia's heir apparent.

articles.author: Brandon Miller, CNN Meteorologist
articles.title: These cities are approaching or setting records for the number of days of extreme cold
articles.description: The dangerous cold across the Central and Southern US has brought extremely low temperatures -- and unusually long stretches of time without much warming.

articles.title: Mount Etna erupts in Italy
articles.description: Snow-covered Mount Etna erupted on Tuesday, spewing a fountain of lava and ash into the sky.

articles.author: Megan Marples, CNN
articles.title: Dinosaurs may have been killed off by a comet instead of an asteroid
articles.description: Researchers theorized that a piece of a comet, rather than an asteroid, hit Earth and caused the extinction of many species 66 million years ago.

articles.title: Rush Limbaugh, conservative media firebrand, dies aged 70

articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: Sorry, America: China is now Europe's biggest trading partner for goods
articles.description: Europe is now trading more goods with China than the United States, a sign of how the pandemic is transforming the global economy.

articles.author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
articles.title: Google Maps will now let you pay for parking and transit without leaving the app
articles.description: Google Maps can already tell you which train to take or map out an optimal driving route. Now, it's simplifying travel even more by letting users pay for parking or public transportation right from their phones.

articles.author: Maria Morava and Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: Animals are freezing to death at this sanctuary in Texas
articles.description: The Texas deep freeze is seeing casualties. Not only human ones. After rolling power outages plunged much of Texas into darkness early this week, animals at Primarily Primates, a primate sanctuary in San Antonio, froze to death in the winter weather.

articles.title: Southern snow and ice storm targets the Northeast next
articles.description: The storm that is dropping snow and freezing rain from Texas through the mid-Mississippi River Valley will head for the Northeast by Thursday and bring more of the white stuff with it.

articles.title: Footage shows a massive crater in Siberia
articles.description: A massive crater appeared violently and explosively in the Siberian tundra last year -- a powerful blowout of methane gas throwing ice and rock hundreds of feet away and leaving a gaping circular scar in the empty and eerie landscape.
